commentBody:
Claims that Bannon has anyuthing to do with alt.com are false. Bannon is pro-Israel, his partner is Jewish and it would be difficult to imagine Ivanka Trump and her husband would tolerate an anti-semite in the White House. The Zionist Organization of America has criticized the ADL's statements (whose chief used to work for Obama).

All this seems to stem from the unproven statements of an ex-wife during a bitter divorce many years ago This is just the continuation of sore loser politics and a biased press that refuses to look at the claims critically.
